name: inspiration
content:
inspiration noun
(IDEAS)
Add to word list
Add to word list
B2 [ C or U ] someone or something that gives you ideas for doing something: inspiration for The golden autumn light provided the inspiration for the painting.divine inspiration He went to church, perhaps seeking divine inspiration.
C2 [ C ] a sudden good idea: have an inspiration He had an inspiration - why not apply for some government money?
More examplesFewer examplesThe idea came to her in a flash of inspiration.What was your inspiration for the new designs?The artist took his inspiration from African art.He drew much inspiration from art produced by children and by primitive cultures.In the 1990s he turned to Brazilian music for inspiration.

(BREATHING IN)
